name: Apprisen Credit Counseling
description: Apprisen is an accredited nonprofit credit counseling organization dedicated to helping people improve their financial well-being through comprehensive financial education, coaching, and counseling services. They offer debt management programs, credit health education, financial health planning, bankruptcy counseling, housing counseling, and student loan education. Apprisen provides personalized financial guidance in a confidential, non-judgmental atmosphere, serving Kentucky residents through multiple locations and online services.
source: Verified from official website, Google Business listing, 211.org directory, and multiple online sources

eligibility_requirements: Open to all individuals seeking financial counseling and debt management assistance
